messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Book Tttle
messages.msgSnippet: ... Is it Trust the Children by Anna Kealoha?  It s out of print right now but a 2nd edition should be available by fall of this year. -- Cindy Ferguson
messages.messageBody:
RobynGee@... wrote:
>
> I am trying to remember the name of a book by Ana something or another. The book's topic is the importance of celebrations in the life of a child. The title may have rainbow in it.
>
> Any ideas?
>

Is it "Trust the Children" by Anna Kealoha? It's out of print right now
but a 2nd edition should be available by fall of this year.

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

messages.messageBody:
I am trying to remember the name of a book by Ana something or another. The book's topic is the importance of celebrations in the life of a child. The title may have rainbow in it.

Any ideas?

Robin
